definition: to handle matters with ease (idiom)/to hold one's own
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
to operate (a machine etc) with ease
free to come and go (idiom)/to have room to maneuver

sentences.english: Rolling code for anti-lost its ultra-thin compact allows you to ease, handy.
sentences.chinese: 滚动码防丢器其小巧超薄让您轻松自如，得心应手。

sentences.english: Slides easily up the rope and jams when the cam is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 防坠器向上滑动自如，而向下受重时凸轮会制停。

sentences.english: I can still move my upper body.
sentences.chinese: 我的上半身依旧活动自如。

sentences.english: Aerobic exercise keeps your muscles strong, which can help you maintain mobility as you get older.
sentences.chinese: 有氧运动锻炼了肌肉，当你年老时仍能灵活自如。

sentences.english: When all these sheaths are transcended, we expand into the state of samadhi .
sentences.chinese: 当所有的能量自如地超越，那么就能进入三摩地状态。

sentences.english: With zero setting on/ off, feeder and slotter can be quick. set to zero, easy operation.
sentences.chinese: 它能减少摩擦，并使旋转零件活动自如。

sentences.english: Elephants walk on tiptoe, they can walk in the mud easily.
sentences.chinese: 他们蹑足而行，可以在泥淖中自如行走。

sentences.english: Leverage computer and Internet tools to make one's work more efficient.
sentences.chinese: 对计算机及因特网的技能运用自如，提高工作效率。

sentences.english: Unbridled drink it and enjoy, enjoy the ease of food.
sentences.chinese: 肆无忌惮的开怀畅饮，轻松自如的享受美食。

sentences.english: These things can hunt in the trees as well as on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 这让毒狼不仅能在地面上狩猎还能在树上进退自如。

sentences.english: My new car gose like a bird. It runs fairly well.
sentences.chinese: 我的新车行驶自如，它跑得非常好。

sentences.english: Hopefully, they can see me play.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望能看到我能应付自如。

sentences.english: You should be able to perform fast heat-switches from the bare simmer to the rolling boil on your burners.
sentences.chinese: 你的炉子应该能在小火慢炖和大火沸腾之间切换自如。

sentences.english: Aimec sees through a single digital eye, allowing it to move freely around the house.
sentences.chinese: 此外，艾米克还能通过一只数位眼在屋子里行动自如。

sentences.english: No matter how complicated the situation was, he could cope with it successfully.
sentences.chinese: 不论情况多么复杂，他都能应付自如。

sentences.english: In this chair, I can move by myself;
sentences.chinese: 坐在轮椅里，我可以行动自如。

definition: handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
to handle matters with ease (idiom)/to hold one's own
free to come and go (idiom)/to have room to maneuver
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced
